content: toe up socks ds on rs with yarn at front slip next stitch purlwise pull working yarn until the two legs of the stitch are showing elongated stitch continue knitting next stitch ds on ws with yarn at front slip next stitch purlwise pull working yarn until the two legs of the stitch are showing elongated stitch continue purling next stitch photo tutorial for dip array socks stitch insert right needle into central purl stitch 3 row below hint look for a big hole to dip into grab working yarn pull through follow chart or written dip into same stitch for second dip this creates the array stitch with 2 knit stitches 1 purl 2 knit stitches in between the dip stitches the whole sock is 3 x 1 ribbing
